conference-2018.title: Hui-ā-tau Scratch 2018:
conference-2018.subtitle: Te Whakatipuranga Hou
conference-2018.dateDescMore: (ko te tūwheratanga kei te pō o te 25 o Hōngongoi)
conference-2018.seeBelow: Ākona anōtia, ngā rā me ngā wāhi o te hui-ā-tau.
conference-2018.desc1: Nau mai, haere mai ki te hui-ā-tau  Scratch@MIT, he hui hīanga mō ngā kaiwhakaako, kairangahau, me ngā iwi whānui o te hapori Scratch o te Ao,
conference-2018.desc2: Kei te whakarite mātou i te hui e taea e te katou ki te uru ki ngā taiwhanga mahi-ā-ringa, he maha hoki ngā wā ka taea te kōrero kanohi-ki-te-kanohi me te mahi tahi. Ko te hunga mā rātou tēnei hui ko ngā pakeke e āwhina i ngā taiohi me ngā tamariki ki te ako i a Scratch.
conference-2018.registrationDate: Ka tīmata ngā rēhitatanga ā te 1 Poutūterangi, 2018.
conference-2018.sessionDesc: Ka hiahia koe ki tētahi tūnga? Kua whā ngā momo marohi e hiahia ana mātou:
conference-2018.sessionItem1Desc: Whakamenomeno i tō hinonga i te whakaaturanga nui, kei te taha o ngā whakaaturanga kē. Ka tukua he wāhi mō te pānui whakaahua me te tēpū mō te rorohiko me ngā tohanga.
conference-2018.sessionItem2Desc: Tomokia ngā tāngata ki ngā mahinga-ā-ringa, kia kite ai ngā huarahi hou mō te waihanga me te mahitahi i a Scratch.
conference-2018.sessionItem3Desc: Whakawhiti whakaaro mō tētahi kaupapa Scratch me te paewhiri, kia toru ngā tāngata tokomaha ake rānei.  Whakamārama mai kei roto i tō marohi, pēhea koe e whakarekareka i te hunga mātakitaki i tō wā whakaaturanga.
conference-2018.sessionItem4Desc: Tuari ō mahi, i tētahi whakaaturanga kia hīkaka, kia poto.
conference-2018.deadline: Ko te rā kati mō ngā marohi, kei te 5 o Huitanguru, 2018.
conference-2018.proposalDeadline: Ko te rā kati mō ngā marohi, kei te 5 o Huitanguru
conference-2018.proposalAccept: Ka whakamōhio atu i ngā whakaae: 1 Poutūterangi
conference-2018.questions: He Pātai? Whakapā mai ki te Tīma Scratch Team kei {emailLink}
conference-2018.submissionQ: Kua pahemo te rā kati. Ka taea tonutia te tuku marohi mō te hui-ā-tau?
conference-2018.submissionAns: Kua kati ināianei te wā tuku marohi.
conference-2018.regQ: Ka taea e au te haere ki te rā kotahi noa iho. Kei te tuku koutou i ngā rēhitatanga mō te rā kotahi noa iho?
conference-2018.regAns: Aroha mai, kāore he tīkete mō te rā kotahi noa.
conference-2018.accommodationsQ: Kei te hiahia ahau ki te whakarite i taku haerenga. He whakaaranga pea ā koutou mō ngā wāhi noho?
conference-2018.accommodationsAns1: Āe, ko ētahi o ngā hoa kaipakihi ō MIT, he hōtera e whakaheke i te utu ki te hunga e haere ana ki ngā hui o MIT, ko ētahi, ko: {marriottLink} (0.6km te tawhiti mai i a MIT Media Lab), {holidayinnLink} (2.5km), {residenceinnLink} (0.5 km), and {lemeridienLink} (1.5 km). Ki te whakarite i te rūma i tētahi o aua hōtēra, waea atu ki a rātou, ā, pātai mō te whakahekenga utu mō MIT. Kia wawe te whakarite, nā te maha o ngā manuhiri i te raumati. Ka taea ngā utu MIT i ngā wā e wātea ana anake.
conference-2018.accommodationsAns2: Ki te hiahia koe ki ētahi atu momo wāhi noho, ko ētahi mea e pai ana ko {acLink} (11 km), {doubletreeLink} (5.3 km), me {hotelbostonLink} me te waehere MITSC2018 (8.5 km). Tērā pea ka hiahia koe ki te aro ki ngā mea pērā ki a Airbnb. Kia kitea te rārangi nohoanga āhua roa nei, tirohia {mitLink}.
conference-2018.accommodationsAns3: Ka taea hoki te noho kei ngā rūma dorm e {neuLink} ka pēnei te utu:
conference-2018.accommodationsAns4: Ki te tono mō te rūma dorm, whakaotia te {dormrequestLink}. Kia mārama koe, kei Boston a Northeastern, e toru ngā km mai i te wāhi e tū ai te hui-ā-taukei MIT. He haurua haora mā runga i ngā waka o te taone, mā subway i runga i a Green Line (te tūnga Northeastern o runga i te E line), Orange Line rānei (te tūnga Ruggles Station).
conference-2018.dormRequestText: Puka tono mō te rūma dorm
conference-2018.letterAns: Āe, whakapā mai ki {emailLink}, ka tuku atu mātou i te reta mā te īmēra.
conference-2018.preConfQ: I ngā tau o mua, i tū tētahi pō takunetanga i te Rāapa i mua i te hui-ā-tau. Ka tū anō tētahi takunetanga pērā ā tēnei tau?
conference-2018.preConfAns: Ka tū tētahi pōwhiri, whakawhanaungatanga ōpaki i te pō o te Rāapa, 25 Hōngongoi. Ka taea hoki ngā tāngata ki te rēhita i taua pō.
conference-2018.bringQ: He aha ngā mea, māku e hari?
conference-2018.bringAns: Haria mai tētahi pūrere kawe (he pai ake ngā rorohiko pona) me te taura hiko. Mā ngā kaiawhkaata e hari mai ngā rauemi whakaaturanga (mā mātou ngā pūrere tukuata me ngā ārai). Ka whakarato mātou i ngā kai iti me ngā inu mō te rā.
conference-2018.moreAns: Whakapā mai ki te tīma Scratch, ki {emailLink}.
